jobDescription: Position ID 236011Title Manager, Demand GenerationDescriptionSales Search Partner is seeking a creative, innovative, and results driven marketing professional that can executive programs that drive leads through the top of the funnel. Our client is a marketing technology startup company, that recently grew out their US sales team and is now working to build out their marketing team. The individual in the Manager Demand Generation role, will have the ability to build out a team moving forward.  Requirements: At least 5 years experience in a marketing/demand generation position1+ years experience with startups, preferably in the high-tech spaceExperience with event managementAbility to collaborate with sales teamCreative, innovative, and results driven $100k OTEPosition Type Perm
